author: jay
post: Charles, thanks for a tremendous article. I think you’ve opened up a new line of inquiry and you make a very good case for a ‘painted’ shroud. Is it possible the original shroud was created as a more muted forgery. This was then re touched on numerous occasions for public display? I’m sure you’re not dismayed by the negativity you’ve received here. I’d take it as a good sign..
title: History vs. Science:  The Freeman Beat Goes On
